episodes.title: New P. Diddy Indictment Reveals ‘Forced Labor’ Claims
episodes.description:
As part of its racketeering and sex crimes case against Sean “Diddy” Combs, the government released new details about Combs’ alleged misconduct, including allegations of forced labor. Law&Crime’s Jesse Weber unravels the differences between the first and second superseding federal indictments.

episodes.title: 13 New P. Diddy Lawsuits Lay Out Graphic Claims Amid Sex Trafficking Case
episodes.description:
Sean “Diddy” Combs is facing more than a dozen brand new lawsuits from multiple defendants. They claim that as far back as the 1990s, Combs drugged and sexually assaulted them. One defendant is also suing VH1, claiming she was attacked while participating in the reality TV series “I Want to Work for Diddy.” Law&Crime’s Jesse Weber takes a closer look at all the latest filings.

episodes.title: P. Diddy Threatened ‘Tupac Hit’ to Silence Alleged Victim: Court Docs
episodes.description:
In a newly filed lawsuit against Sean “Diddy” Combs, a John Doe claims the music-mogul allegedly threatened him to stay quiet by claiming “if I can get Pac hit, what the f— do you think could happen to you?” Pac — most likely referencing Tupac Shakur — was murdered in 1996. John Doe claims the alleged threat was made after Diddy allegedly sexually assaulted him. Law&Crime’s dissects the lawsuit on this episode of On the Case.

episodes.description:

Law&Crime’s Jesse Weber spoke with forensic psychiatrist Dr. Daniel Bober about a new documentary on the horrific abuse that led to Franke’s arrest and imprisonment.

episodes.title: P. Diddy Wants to Block 'Archenemy' from Practicing Law
episodes.description:
Tony Buzbee, the attorney behind a multitude of civil lawsuits against Sean “Diddy” Combs, is working to get proper authorization to practice in the Southern District of New York. The embattled rapper and producer, who's currently sitting in federal lockup as he awaits a criminal trial, has now actively sought to oppose Buzbee’s efforts to be admitted. Law&Crime’s Jesse Weber has the latest.

episodes.description: South Carolina pastor John Paul Miller and his father Reginald are facing a lawsuit from a woman who says JP raped her when she was 15. She claims when she encountered him years later, he assaulted her again. The legal complaint comes as Miller himself filed more than a dozen lawsuits against people who protested outside his church following his wife Mica Miller’s death. Law&Crime’s Jesse Weber spoke with Mica Miller’s family attorney Regina Ward about the latest allegations. Law&Crime’s Jesse Weber discussed the latest developments with Mica Miller’s former family court attorney.

episodes.title: Russell Brand Faces Disturbing Sexual Assault Allegations from Multiple Women
episodes.description:
Multiple women are speaking out against famed actor Russell Brand with shocking allegations of sexual assault. Brand, whose career peaked over a decade ago, is accused of assaulting a then-16-year-old girl. These allegations come after Brand’s former co-star on “Get Him To The Greek,” Sean “Diddy” Combs, was indicted on federal charges of sex trafficking and racketeering. Law&Crime’s Elizabeth Millner breaks down the allegations faced by Brand.

episodes.title: P. Diddy and JLo Fought Before Rapper Allegedly Raped 13-Year-Old: Report
episodes.description:
Photos have surfaced from January 2000 that show Sean "Diddy" Combs and his then-girlfriend, singer Jennifer Lopez, appearing to argue at an MTV Video Music Awards afterparty. Questions have been raised about that night after a woman filed a lawsuit claiming Combs sexually assaulted her at a house that night when she was 13. The suit claims an unnamed male and female celebrity were present at the time of the assault. Law&Crime's Angenette Levy looks at the suit and claims the couple argued that night in this episode of Crime Fix  — a daily show covering the biggest stories in crime.

episodes.title: Mysterious Leak of P. Diddy’s Brutal Hotel Attack Video Shakes Up Sex Trafficking Case
episodes.description:
Casandra Ventura filed a lawsuit against her ex-boyfriend, Sean “Diddy” Combs, in November 2023. Diddy immediately settled the case within 24 hours, while simultaneously refusing to settle other civil lawsuits. The famed music mogul took to Instagram a few months later after a video surfaced showing him attacking Cassie in a hotel. Diddy’s legal team alleges federal investigators leaked the video. Still, the government claims otherwise. Law&Crime’s Elizabeth Millner breaks down the mystery surrounding the most disturbing piece of evidence released in Diddy’s case so far.

episodes.description:
Sean "Diddy" Combs was indicted on charges of sex trafficking and racketeering after a lengthy federal investigation. The famed music mogul also faces numerous allegations of abuse in dozens of civil lawsuits. From seemingly being on top of the world to sitting inside a New York City jail cell, Diddy's rise and fall has shocked the nation. Liz Scherer reacts to key pieces in Diddy's case and actions taken by the disgraced rapper.

In Judge Reacts, she dives into the world of law and true crime, offering sharp insights on gripping courtroom moments and real-life legal dramas. With her signature no-nonsense approach, Judge Liz invites viewers to become her jury, exploring both the serious and complex sides of the justice system. Tune in for a compelling insider's perspective on the law.

episodes.title: Prime Crime: Young Mennonite Woman Hunted Down and Executed Over Her Faith
episodes.description:
Sasha Krause mysteriously disappeared after heading off to church in January 2020. The Mennonite woman and Sunday school teacher was missing for five weeks until a camper made a shocking discovery. Three hundred miles from her home, Krause's body was found. Investigators were puzzled about how Krause even disappeared in the first place and why she was murdered. episodes.title: 5 Creepy Similarities of Ruby Franke and Lori Vallow Daybell
episodes.description:
Extreme religious beliefs were at the center of criminal cases for Ruby Franke in Utah and Lori Vallow Daybell in Idaho. Vallow Daybell was convicted of murdering her two children, as well as her new husband’s first wife. Franke entered a guilty plea to multiple counts of aggravated child abuse. Law&Crime’s Jesse Weber analyzes the similarities between the women’s backgrounds, beliefs, and crimes.

Bodycam footage shows police searching Jodi Hildebrandt’s Utah home after Ruby Franke’s 12-year-old son escaped and rushed to a neighbor’s home for help on August 30, 2023. The video shows officers rushing into Hildebrandt’s home after detaining her and searching every room until they find Franke’s daughter, who was scared and hiding in a bathroom closet. Law&Crime’s Elizabeth Millner breaks down how officers found the young girl and what happened next.

episodes.title: Ruby Franke’s Son Begs for Help After Escaping Jodi Hildebrandt’s Home
episodes.description:
Video shows Ruby Franke’s son after he escaped Jodi Hildebrandt’s home on August 30, 2023. The 12-year-old, who was emaciated, broke free from being tied up and rushed to a neighbor’s home while covered in duct tape. The young boy asked Hildebrandt’s neighbors to take him to the nearest police station. Franke and Hildebrandt were arrested later that day. The duo pleaded guilty to four counts of aggravated child abuse in connection to this incident. Law&Crime’s Sierra Gillespie breaks down all the evidence from her son’s brave escape.

episodes.description:
Utah police showed up at Jodi Hildebrandt’s home on August 30, 2023, and found Ruby Franke’s daughter hiding inside a bathroom closet. During the search of Hildebrandt’s home, Jodi remained outside with an officer and told them that the police presence must have scared her Airbnb guests. Before police showed up, another one of Franke’s children escaped from the home and went to a neighbor’s house asking for food and water.

episodes.title: Bodycam: Ruby Franke Appears Angry, Annoyed While Getting Arrested for Child Abuse
episodes.description:
Bodycam footage shows Ruby Franke being arrested on August 30, 2023, after her 12-year-old son escaped from Jodi Hildebrandt’s home, begging her neighbors to take him to the police station. The YouTube mom appears angry and annoyed as officers put handcuffs on her and take her to the police department. The officer who transported Ruby to the department noted that she is “definitely not a talker,” noting how she remained silent whenever possible. Franke was charged with multiple counts of child abuse, four of which she pleaded guilty to.

episodes.description:
After two of Ruby Franke’s children were found bruised and covered with duct tape, her husband, Kevin Franke, was questioned by Utah police. In his interview on August 30, 2023, Kevin Franke said he trusted Jodi Hildebrandt and claimed she was a very honest and truthful person. When police told him what had happened to his children, he said “this sounds like a made up story” and it sounded like “a horror movie.”

episodes.title: Ruby Franke and Jodi Hildebrandt Questioned by Cops After Child Abuse Arrest
episodes.description:
Bodycam footage shows Ruby Franke and Jodi Hildebrandt being questioned by police after they were arrested on August 30, 2023. Authorities took the duo into custody after Franke’s 12-year-old son escaped from Hildebrandt’s home covered in wounds and duct tape. Ruby appeared stone-faced and remained silent while officers asked her questions. “I’ll wait till I have a lawyer,” the YouTube mom said after refusing to answer questions. Hildebrandt told police she was advised by her attorney to not answer any questions. “I’m a psychologist, I watch people flip things all the time,” Hildebrandt insisted.

episodes.title: Andrew Tate Faces New Sex Crimes Charges Following Adin Ross Exposing His Plans
episodes.description:
Controversial social media influencer Andrew Tate and his brother Tristan were once again arrested by Romanian authorities, this time accused of sex crimes in the United Kingdom. Attorneys for the alleged victims rushed to request extradition after Twitch streamer Adin Ross mentioned during a live stream that Tate planned to soon leave Romania. Law&Crime’s Jesse Weber speaks with the UK attorneys behind the extradition request, Jack Beeston and Matthew Jury.

Neighbors witnessed the group appearing to worship to sun and run naked in their yard before their disappearance. Law&Crime’s Sierra Gillespie breaks down the disturbing disappearances.

episodes.title: Lori Vallow Daybell Juror Breaks Silence on ‘Doomsday Cult’ Mom Conviction
episodes.description:
An alternate juror who oversaw Lori Vallow Daybell’s triple murder trial is breaking her silence on what led to a guilty verdict for the “doomsday cult” mom. Daybell was convicted Friday of killing her two kids, J.J. Vallow and Tylee Ryan, along with “prophet” Chad Daybell’s late wife, Tammy Daybell. The Law&Crime Network’s Jesse Weber discusses the high-profile trial with juror Tiffany.

episodes.title: ‘Lori It Ended’: Larry Woodcock Slams Lori Vallow Daybell For Murdering His Grandson
episodes.description:
“Turn out the lights, the party is over,” Larry Woodcock sang when speaking with reporters about the conviction of Lori Vallow Daybell for the murders of her two children, J.J. Vallow and Tylee Ryan. Larry and his wife, Kay, are J.J. Vallow’s grandparents — the two have been in the courtroom almost every day throughout the “doomsday cult” mom murder trial. “The next trial is Chad,” Larry said. “I look forward to being at this courthouse again.”

episodes.title: Polygamist Cult 'Prophet' Sam Bateman Caught Towing Underage Girls in Trailer with Porta-Potty
episodes.description:
WATCH: Bodycam footage shows Arizona police arresting polygamist cult "prophet" Samuel Bateman after he was found traveling with underage girls inside a squalid trailer in August. Authorities said a witness told police he saw human fingers poking out of Bateman's trailer prior to the traffic stop. The video shows officers questioning the self-proclaimed "prophet" about who he's traveling with before opening the trailer and discovering the disturbing conditions inside. The trailer along with the girls appeared to have a porta-potty, couch, blankets, food, and a stroller. Bateman faces charges of federal kidnapping and tampering with evidence and has pleaded not guilty to all charges.

#Police #Bodycam #LawAndCrime
